file.name: a.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: ""
  version: ""
servers:
  - url: /
paths:
  /api/foo:
    get:
      responses:
        200:
          description: ""
          content:
            application/json;charset=utf-8:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Bad"
components:
  schemas:
    Bad:
      anyOf:
        - $ref: "#/components/schemas/Bad"

Error: buildIR: make ir: path "/api/foo": get: responses: 200: contents: application/json;charset=utf-8: generate schema: anyOf: anyOf "#/components/schemas/Bad" [0]: reference "#/components/schemas/Bad" [0] leads to infinite recursion
